attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. If you're seeking a compact SUV with impressive versatility, know that the 2022 Honda CR-V does just about everything well, the CR-V has become the world’s best-selling SUV. 
The two-row Honda provides an attractive and spacious cabin bolstered by bountiful storage solutions that are perfect for road trips.
Good to look at, good to drive, and good on petrol: the CR-V is among the most fuel-efficient compact crossovers. This vehicle is backed by a comprehensive 5 year/200 000 km warranty, as well as a 5 year/90 000 km service plan.

Finance Available to all Approved Buyers, Trade in's are Welcome and Delivery Nationwide.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. Discover greatness, explore the world in style with this new exquisite Honda CR-V Executive. The world is yours behind the wheel of the CR-V, the fluid lines of the CR-V were designed not only to create a sleek and dynamic look but also to assist performance by channeling airflow, resulting in improved fuel economy. The CR-V has been built with safety in mind, with six airbags guaranteeing full protection in case of an emergency. Driver Attention Monitor, aids the driver in overall awareness by notifying the driver when the vehicle is straying from the current lane. Inside the CR-V, you will find premium comfort and entertainment. From the polished dashboard to the spacious seats, you will always have a good time in this SUV. If you are looking for a vehicle that delivers on all fronts, choose the new CR-V. This vehicle includes a 5 years/200000km warranty and a 5 years/90000km service plan. Make it yours and book your test drive today!
Finance Available, Trade in's are Welcome and Delivery Nationwide.
